punchline: Request and Upload subtitles for Youtube
business_address: Business Address: 12108 63, Byeollae 4-ro, Namyangju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea, 3408-703
subcloud_aim: SubCloud aims to overcome language barriers on the web through subtitles
free_request_ex_front: Request subtitles you want WHENEVER you want
free_request_ex_back: When there are subtitles, we will notify you as soon as possible
unconstrained_sub_production_ex_front: Make money and Build your career by making subtitles
unconstrained_sub_production_ex_back: You can receive user thanks as a notification
without_moving_front: Subtitles on video you watch without moving website
without_moving_back: Subtitles can be loaded with a few clicks
get_touch_account: Get in touch or create an account
membership_explain: Start with 14-day free trial. No credit card needed. You can cancel at anytime.
buy_point: Points are goods that can be used to request subtitles within SubCloud.
